definition: to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse
to use the current topic to put over one's own ideas/to use sth as a pretext to make a fuss

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役军人在就业时也应当注意发挥自身优势。

sentences.english: This paper lays stress on the fulfillment of students' initiative in English teaching.
sentences.chinese: 本文强调在英语教学中应始终发挥学生的主体作用。

sentences.english: Regional and sub-regional organizations could play unique roles under the leadership of the United Nations. Financial support is important.
sentences.chinese: 区域和次区域组织可以在联合国领导下发挥独特作用。
今天我们的球队发挥得极好。

sentences.english: In this context, the internet can serve as a great equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，互联网可发挥调节器的作用。

sentences.english: In the men's team final, Hungary team to play extremely well.
sentences.chinese: 在男子团体决赛中，匈牙利队的发挥非常出色。

sentences.english: And what do those visiting Karneval dress up as? Everything imaginable.
sentences.chinese: 看看这些科隆狂欢节参与者的打扮，发挥你的想象吧。

sentences.english: For patch updates and to play a fast demo, see below.
sentences.chinese: 修补更新和发挥快速演示，见下文。

sentences.english: In science, the obvious role of imagination is in the context of discovery.
sentences.chinese: 在科学中，想象在发现的过程中发挥了明显的作用。

sentences.english: Music or sound effects to bring out the best of your creations.
sentences.chinese: 音乐或声音效果，以发挥所长，你的创作。

sentences.english: The complementarity between two factories play a co-production functions to the greatest limit.
sentences.chinese: 工厂之间的互辅及合作生产功能发挥到最大的极限。

sentences.english: China is not the only emerging financier playing a major role in Africa.?
sentences.chinese: 中国不仅是在非洲发挥重要作用的惟一的新兴融资方。

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: Of course I shoved an 8-year old kid out of the way so I could play with it.
sentences.chinese: 当然我只管一个8岁的孩子走出了我可以发挥的地方。

sentences.english: In this transformation process, Sino-Japanese War plays an important role.
sentences.chinese: 在这一转型过程中，甲午战争发挥了重要作用。

definition: to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents
